column1: #dig start(2;2; Center tile of a 3-tile square) This is a 3x3
column2: 4 z-level (1 full counter-clockwise spiral) ramp staircase by taodih. It has two up ramps per level. NOTE: Always begin a z-level down from where you want to start. (Ramps are upwards. Thus
column3: you need to start these designations from a z-level below.)
